content.label: This audiobook app is simple to use and has all the essential functionality. I use it every day and their customer service is second to none. Keep up the good work!
Listening from the app this skipped over parts of the book. Downloaded version stops a repeats. Not a good experience.

title.label: Excellent App!  I have been using it for awhile and am very happy with it!!

content.label: Easy to use, just an all around great app!

title.label: Works well most of the time

content.label: I like the price of the books, relatively low price of monthly or annual membership if chosen and that I can archive purchases downloading or streaming what I need.  The major con is sometimes after making a stop and restarting the book it will not advance to the next track.
I've used this app for years now and average at least a book a week.  My favorites are the very affordable Specials!

I‚Äôve had a maddening first experience with this app: mid sentence, my book skips ahead. I try rewinding, rewinding, rewinding to find where I left off, but then it skips head mid rewind. Of course I have no idea where I WAS so I have to start the previous chapter over again. ARGH!

FOLLOW UP: credit due ... they‚Äôve reached out to me to work on the issue. Plus 1 star!

I always wondered why their isn‚Äôt more choices with audibook apps. But I still dont know. Good lord this app is horrible. What‚Äôs funny about this app specifically, it actually has ONE job. Play audio from a source I selected. But it can‚Äôt even do that one thing correctly. It pauses for no reason, then when you unpause it, it goes back about 25 min from where it paused. Like ??????????????????

Books are fine, and it works a lot of the time, but good grief! The player sometimes randomly stops, you can‚Äôt reengage it from the lock screen, and when you open the app to start it again, it‚Äôs not at the same spot it stopped. Then other times on the lock screen the pause button won‚Äôt work, same thing happens when you open the app to get it to pause, when you start it again it‚Äôs not in the same spot. From the reviews, it sounds like this has been happening for quite a while since some of the reviews are two years old so it would probably be good to get this stuff fixed.
Great App! I use it all the time on all devices. Even in the car. Since the prices are quite decent, I never run out of listening hour. Thanks

I downloaded and used audiobooks now without a problem maybe two years ago. I since upgraded from nook to iPad and I wish this app actually worked. I get two sentences out if it before it stops and have to hit the arrow to make it start again. I‚Äôve tried both download option as well as streaming- neither operates correctly. Too bad I purchased the books as I am unable to listen to them.
I subscribe because I wanted to listen to the outlander series and once I clicked in found that Outlander isn‚Äôt on the list!! I‚Äôm not just disappointed I‚Äôm angry!!!

title.label: Legend of Sleepy Hollow read by Bob Neufeld

content.label:
What I like about this app is that it has a ‚Äúsleep‚Äù timer on it. I love listening to readings of good books before I fall asleep. It‚Äôs actually a sleep aid for me. I set the timer to 30 minutes and I‚Äôm usually asleep in 10.
Bob Neufeld reads The Legend of Sleepy Hollow so well.
I love audiobooks now listen everyday prices are reasonable Librafy large

First of all, buyer beware; you have to buy your books in a browser and not the app to get the advertised prices. If you try to buy them in the app, then they have to pay apple some surcharge, and the price to us is much higher, too.  

Second of all, the app is completely useless if you need to know the time remaining in a book, or if you need to jump forward or back without dropping everything and picking up your phone and looking at it ‚Äî or waking up to look at it (many of us listen to audiobooks to rest or sleep)

They seem to think that the only thing that matters is the chapter remaining time! (Speaking for myself, if I could only have one, the time remaining in the book is much more important to me)

They added a ‚Äútotal time remaining‚Äù but it just gives the negative of the elapsed chapter time! 

If I turned that in, I would get an F.

I love the service, and i love that they don‚Äôt have all the useless crap that always gets in the way that amazon shoved into the audible app, so audiobooksnow‚Äôs interface is much better than amazon‚Äôs. 

But who on earth thought that oversaturated white and red was a good idea?

(You could take a page from Hulu‚Äôs book; their app redesign when they added live service was almost universally panned for being too glaringly bright and cartoonish and obscuring their actual content, so they redid it. And instead of sticking to the hideous theme colors they had, they shifted them slightly to better versions and used them as accents.)

If the ‚Äúaudio book playing‚Äù screen had swipe left or right to jump back or forward some number of seconds programmable in settings, and swipe up or down to raise or lower volume, that would add fantastic functionality to the app.
I really enjoy the app, only problem I have had is getting supplements that some books offered.
I use this app everyday. I love that they have sales often. I have enjoyed many different types of books. I can‚Äôt imagine getting through my week without the app.
I have canceled this and I am still being charged 14.99 please cancel

I had to download the book and move it to a different app as I had constant issues losing where I was in the book after various interruptions (phone calls etc) . Keeping constant and exact location of the book is an extrely important feature this app struggles to get right.
If these are sappose to be audibles you sure can‚Äôt play them only buy them. That‚Äôs not an audible. You should change the name of this app.

Have enjoyed the app for some time tho there is now an App I use more frequently because it tends to have more deals on books.  But, because Audio seems to have a wider range, if I truly want to hear a special book, Audio is my go to.

Love listening to the stories from whatever device I happen to have on from the same place I left off.   It is so easy to sign up and buy books.    I would highly recommend this app to anyone who loves audio books but hates most of the hassle of cds, high prices, and it only being on the device you downloaded it on.    This is so simple for me and I love it!
I had an issue getting purchased and I called them and they walked me through cleaning up my phone.   Have no problems since.  I love this app

title.label: One of the best places to get audiobooks!

content.label: I have been a club member for a couple of years and has switched from their website to the app. So far it works well and I have not had any problems. Audiobooks seem to play fine and download easily. I can login and access my account with no problems, search for Audiobooks and check out which books are on sale. Overall I am very satisfied!

I love this app and I love the pricing. I‚Äôm a big Star Wars fan so most of my purchases are Star Wars books and I have over 20. Love the discounts for being a member. I feel like I‚Äôve saved money vs Audible. Highly recommend.

name.label: Hate this app it's not free

content.label: I Searched up free audiobook but it was not free and I am very mad üò§
Audio jumps around randomly, keeps rewinding and the pause button doesn‚Äôt always work from Apple controls
The app has a bug that loses my place whenever I hit pause. Annoying!

The deals are pretty great: $6 a month gets you an audiobook for half price. The app itself is...less than amazing. The player frequently stops working at random when a track concludes, and you have to press play to resume. Files take a long time to download, and will spontaneously cease downloading, forcing you to relaunch the app. A little tinkering with the bugs in the player would probably fix these issues.

I like most aspects of this app: good variety, decent price, lots of great sales, etc. the one thing I definitely don‚Äôt like is how touchy the buttons are. I pause the story frequently, and more than half the time, I jumps backwards between 30seconds and 9 minutes. Very frustrating.
Not the greatest app. I bought a book on here which I thought I‚Äôd bought outright. I didn‚Äôt realise I was on their continuity. Just be careful! I‚Äôd like to cancel my subscription now.

title.label: Love app but one seriously frustrating issue!

content.label: Love app but has one issue I detest...many times at the end of a track, the book stops. Soooo I have to stop whatever I‚Äôm doing and go to the track list, find the next one and hit play. VERY annoying and not convenient. Please fix!  Floating in pool with Bluetooth headphones and it stops - have to get out and grab phone to fix. Same with any other activity.
We listen to Audiobooksnow all the time. We travel often and alway have a book or to ready to go!

I do quite a bit of driving for my job , And I downloaded this app so I could listen to books . I love this app because I can find most of the books I love and new ones that I wanted to read . Great quality and lotsssss of titles !

Will this app ever be updated to accommodate the newer phone screen sizes?  

App screen shots show that this app appropriately fills the iPhone X display.  The app does not.  Looks like it hasn‚Äôt been redesigned since the iPhone 4 came out.

Still buggy, too.

CarPlay support would be a fantastic addition.

i have been reading to all the boys i‚Äôve loved before. this app lets me eat, lay down, cook and more just by someone reading to me. it‚Äôs so cool and easy.  the books are a little pricey, but overall, sometimes it‚Äôs worth it.
The service is great, but the 30 second skip button seems a bit long. This app could use a 10 or 15 second skip, or an option to customize the length.
Hi there. Enjoying ordering a new books , love and appreciate easy access and quality of app.
This is the only app I use it‚Äôs affordable and reliable has had a few glitches / problems over the years but all in all very reliable and a great place to buy store and explore my reading life !!!

I have been pleased with my overall experience using this app. It is easy to navigate and I appreciate the updates that continue to improve my user experience. It is a bit disappointing that you cannot get your discounted pricing through the app. But that really hasn‚Äôt prohibited are use in anyway.

I am enjoying this book I have 33 minutes left. 
It is a contemporary romance so it is different, the characters are portrayed great and the Texting is so very Morden it may not be for romantic peoIt‚Äô

I'm on the Club Pricing plan, and overall this app works.

+ I like that it's mostly DRM free, so I could put the files into Music or another app, but I prefer to use this one.

+ Had multiple speedup options for playback (1.25x, 1.5x, etc.). Saves a lot of time.

- Ugly, unresponsive web app. Come on, build a native app already.

- Still needs an internet connection to play already downloaded books. Makes it useless on an airplane.

- Sometimes tracks break at set intervals, not at logical places in the book like chapters or headings. Many times I'll want to go back a couple of minutes and find I can't because we started a new track. You can't back up 30 seconds into the previous track. You have to manually select it from the track list and find your place again.

I got charged for something and I have proof on my card statement and proof from iTunes/apple and I have no idea what was purchased but I clearly do not have a book, audiobook or membership! I want my money returned! I literally do not have anything in my ‚Äúlibrary‚Äù. I will take this to small claims if I have to.
This app is the best audiobooks app that I have ever used üëÜüèªüëâüèΩüëãüëèüôåüèøüòΩüòºüòπüò∏üò∫ü§†
Rewind and fast forward can be done only by 30 secs which is too long.

Non-intuitive interface. Does not save your place in the audiobook. Requires you to enter an email, Which means this is used to scrape personal information. Generally one of the poorest app experiences I‚Äôve ever had. And yes I have the most recent version, and the most up-to-date OS. I was eager to read my sample audiobook, and I‚Äôm so frustrated by the app that I‚Äôve just given up even though it‚Äôs not available anywhere else.

The streaming playback routinely loses its spot and then will skip to the next chapter. After I finish the one book I bought through this company, I‚Äôm switching to audible. More expensive, but I got this for my drive and I can‚Äôt constantly keep looking at my phone trying to figure out how to get back to the spot before it skipped ahead. Maybe playing through the website is more reliable, but there is no forward or rewind feature that I saw.

The playback features are very weak and app offers very little control over play modes. Difficult to go back and delays between controls and what you‚Äôre hearing. Plus, I unknowingly got hit for a monthly subscription fee  but book pricing is only a couple of dollars better than others. Monthly was my fault for not reading fine print but they‚Äôre sneaky and I don‚Äôt like sneaky (see Luminosity). And you can‚Äôt cancel in app, you have to go log in on their website. Sneaky sneaky, make it hard, don‚Äôt like that.
I have a long commute and I live listening to audiobooks. This app allows me to download them and listen to them as I go.

I love this app!! I get great prices for all books and since I drive frequently to visit my parents this app makes the 8 hour drive fun!! Also makes my work commute exciting instead of sad as morning drivers can be pretty cranky!! I have always lived to read but so hard to find the time now so what could be better than this app!! If I have problems it is either with my phone or cords but none with the app so far and I have used it for at least 2 years!! Thanks for the awesome books!
Works great
